results.title: Here's your bike, Ed!
results.creator_credit: Vic Roads, Taylormade Films, John Taylor and Steve Westh
results.brief_description: The purpose of this title is to demonstrate a variety of skills that children need to cycle safely on roads. Designed to accompany a Bike Ed program in schools, with Teacher’s notes, there are a variety of activities and drills which will develop children’s confidence as bike riders and users of the road.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vic Roads, Taylormade Films, John Taylor and Steve Westh

results.title: Here's to Your health: std's
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit, Craig Reardon and Robert Grant
results.brief_description: This program sets out to raise the awareness of issues regarding sexually transmitted diseases. It emphasizes the presentation of correct information and examines the transmission of STD’s and the prevention of all STD’s.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit, Craig Reardon and Robert Grant

results.title: Here's to your health: skincare
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit, Craig Reardon and Robert Grant
results.brief_description: Australia has the highest rate of skin cancer in the world. This program looks at the problem of skin cancer, how to detect it and how to care for your skin when out in the sun.

results.title: Here's to your health: health for youth
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit, Craig Reardon and Robert Grant

results.title: Here's to your health: alcohol
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit, Craig Reardon and Robert Grant
results.brief_description: A program which aims to reduce alcohol consumption by addressing social and cultural aspects which influence teenagers to drink. The program also promotes some alcohol-free activities in the community.

results.title: Here's the Sex Pistols
results.creator_credit: Sex Pistols Residuals and Sex Pistols
results.brief_description: Live performance by the British rock punk group, the Sex Pistols, at the Longhorn Ballroom, Dallas on 10 January 1978. Also includes two bonus clips of “Anarchy in the UK” and “God save the Queen”. Members of the band: Johnny Rotten, Sid Vicious, Steve Jones and Paul Cook.
results.description: Live performance by the British rock punk group, the Sex Pistols, at the Longhorn Ballroom, Dallas on 10 January 1978. Also includes two bonus clips of “Anarchy in the UK” and “God save the Queen”. Members of the band: Johnny Rotten, Sid Vicious, Steve Jones and Paul Cook.

results.title: Here's sport
results.creator_credit: BBC Film Unit and Ray Dicks
results.brief_description: Pokes gentle fun at the British pre-occupation with sport, but provides at the same time a lively and comprehensive review of British sporting life, ranging from the big popular games - such as cricket and football - to indoor marbles and a race for traction engines.
results.description: Pokes gentle fun at the British pre-occupation with sport, but provides at the same time a lively and comprehensive review of British sporting life, ranging from the big popular games - such as cricket and football - to indoor marbles and a race for traction engines.
